import{capitalize}from'lodash';// ----------------------------------------------------------------------
var PRIMARY_NAME=['A','N','H','L','Q','9','8'];var INFO_NAME=['F','G','T','I','J','1','2','3'];var SUCCESS_NAME=['K','D','Y','B','O','4','5'];var WARNING_NAME=['P','E','R','S','C','U','6','7'];var ERROR_NAME=['V','W','X','M','Z'];function getFirstCharacter(name){return capitalize(name&&name.charAt(0));}function getAvatarColor(name){if(PRIMARY_NAME.includes(getFirstCharacter(name)))return'primary';if(INFO_NAME.includes(getFirstCharacter(name)))return'info';if(SUCCESS_NAME.includes(getFirstCharacter(name)))return'success';if(WARNING_NAME.includes(getFirstCharacter(name)))return'warning';if(ERROR_NAME.includes(getFirstCharacter(name)))return'warning';return'default';}export default function createAvatar(name){return{name:getFirstCharacter(name),color:getAvatarColor(name)};}
